mapper.sql: id as id , status as status , creator as creator , createDate as createDate , lastModifier as lastModifier , lastModDate as lastModDate , name as name , telphone as telphone , address as address , areaId as areaId
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO gk_agent ( status, creator, createDate, lastModifier, lastModDate, name, telphone, address, areaId ) VALUES ( #{status}, #{creator}, #{createDate}, #{lastModifier}, #{lastModDate}, #{name}, #{telphone}, #{address}, #{areaId} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE gk_agent
status = #{status},
creator = #{creator},
createDate = #{createDate},
lastModifier = #{lastModifier},
lastModDate = #{lastModDate},
name = #{name},
telphone = #{telphone},
address = #{address},
areaId = #{areaId},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE gk_agent
status = #{map.status},
creator = #{map.creator},
createDate = #{map.createDate},
lastModifier = #{map.lastModifier},
lastModDate = #{map.lastModDate},
name = #{map.name},
telphone = #{map.telphone},
address = #{map.address},
areaId = #{map.areaId},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gk_agent ( status, creator, createDate, lastModifier, lastModDate, name, telphone, address, areaId ) VALUES ( #{map.status}, #{map.creator}, #{map.createDate}, #{map.lastModifier}, #{map.lastModDate}, #{map.name}, #{map.telphone}, #{map.address}, #{map.areaId} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM gk_agent
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{condition.id} , '%')
AND status like CONCAT('%', #{condition.status} , '%')
AND creator like CONCAT('%', #{condition.creator} , '%')
AND createDate like CONCAT('%', #{condition.createDate} , '%')
AND lastModifier like CONCAT('%', #{condition.lastModifier} , '%')
AND lastModDate like CONCAT('%', #{condition.lastModDate} , '%')
AND name like CONCAT('%', #{condition.name} , '%')
AND telphone like CONCAT('%', #{condition.telphone} , '%')
AND address like CONCAT('%', #{condition.address} , '%')
AND areaId like CONCAT('%', #{condition.areaId} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
